Age, sex, and type of benefit: SOURCE: Social Security Administration, Master Beneficiary Record, 100 percent data.
Nondisabled: NOTES: Because of differences in data sources and calculation methods, statistics reported in this table may differ from those reported by the Office of the Chief Actuary.
Disabled widow(er)s: Effective 2006, age is based on date of entitlement and not date of award. Entitlement can be retroactive and thus precede the date of award.
Widows: a. Benefits awarded before the December cost-of-living increase are converted to the December rates before averages are computed.
